task.title: Change Privacy Restrictions
task.shortdesc: Under the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA), you have the right to restrict all or part of your directory information, which includes your preferred email, your enrollment status (full-time/part-time), major field of study, and more.

step.cmd: Log in to Mypack portal and navigate to the Student Homepage
Select ‘Privacy Restrictions’ in the left-hand menu
Find the correct directory field and:

choices.choice: Select ‘Restrict’ to restrict access to the information in this field.
Select ‘Clear’ to release the restriction on this field.

step.cmd: Click the green ‘Save’ button to save your changes

info.note: NOTE: Select a “full privacy” block to prevent us from sharing your information with anyone, including employers. A full privacy block also prevents your inclusion in graduation and Dean’s List publications.
